posts.post_title: FS 1910-12 Sweet Caporal Pin Josh Devore
posts.post_content:
Hello Everyone,

I have this 1910-12 Sweet Caporal Pin featuring Josh Devore, New York Giants, for sale. Missing paper advertising on the reverse.

Price: $14.95 delivered.

Payment: Paypal, check, or money order are all acceptable.

First response with a commitment to purchase gets the pin.


Thanks for looking,

Joe
